<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the formatted name for Flang parser class. The generic formatted class</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// name is constructed from the name were the first letter of each word is</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ex: async -&gt; Async</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Cap = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::transform(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.end(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.begin(), &#91;&amp;Cap&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (Cap == true) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
